message: Can anyone report on convore at SXSW? Do people like the service? Is it starting to take off? Will convore be a twitter killer??
Not comparable; Twitter is totally different.
Agreed. Different purposes, bit there is some cross over.
The thing I like about convore is organizing posts into groups and then topics and being able to go back and easily see the new posts. For me, in many ways, convore is more useful than twitter.
We've gotten to meet a ton of really great people who use Convore here at SXSW!
@craig what do you use twitter for?

@chrisc to share links to content I produce as well as other interesting articles. I would like to use it more for conversations but it's no so great for that. Here's my twitter: http://twitter.com/craigshipp
@bluekite2000 we started working on convore in october
How long did it take for convore to go from idea to where it is right now?
I just discovered convore the other day looking for irc clients. I'm an old forum guy so I absolutely love the concept.
@ckhicks cool. I was wondering how many people are into forums here
@leah Not enough we need to all spread the word about convore so it can really take off!
